channel.title: Snack on Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in Snack on Cookbook

item.title: Hot and Spicy Chex Mix
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 3 cups corn Chex
  • 3 cups rice Chex
  • 1 cup mixed nuts
  • 1 cup pretzels
  • 1/4 cup butter
  • 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 tablespoon red pepper sauce
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1/2 teaspoon chili powder
  • 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper

Directions

  1. preheat over to 250 degrees
  2. mix cereal, nuts, and pretzels in a large mixing bowl; set aside
  3. melt butter, stir in Worcestershire sauce, spices, and hot sauce
  4. pour butter mixture over cereal, stir to evenly coat
  5. spread in a parchment paper lined baking sheet
  6. bake 1 hour, stirring every 20 minutes; cool

item.title: Oat Bars
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1 1/4 cups peanut butter
  • 1/2 cup honey
  • 3/4 cup shredded coconut
  • 8 teaspoons sunflower seeds
  • 8 teaspoons flax seeds
  • 1/2 cup raisins
  • 2 1/2 cups rolled oats

Directions

  1. melt peanut butter and honey together
  2. mix in everything else except the oats
  3. mix in the oats
  4. flatten out in a square baking dish
  5. refrigerate for 1 hour
  6. slice into bars
  7. refrigerate for another hour
  8. store in an airtight container
